data.title: 10 Best Hotels near Arthur Ashe Stadium, New York 2024
data.meta_description: Find best hotels near Arthur Ashe Stadium in New York with promotions and discounts on Trip.com. Book rooms after reading real guest reviews and authentic pictures about hotels near Arthur Ashe Stadium on Trip.com!
data.text:
When booking a hotel in New York, what are the most popular areas to stay in?

When visiting New York, many travelers choose to stay at hotels in the following areas: Times Square or Wall Street/Financial District.

What are some popular economy hotels in New York?

West Side YMCA, Comfort Inn JFK Airport and HI New York City Hostel are popular economy hotels with good ratings.

How much do hotels in New York cost?

Based on hotel prices on Trip.com, the average cost per night for hotels in New York is USD 807. Hotel rates change often; this price is for reference only.

What are the most popular hotels in New York?

Whether you're traveling for business or going on vacation, there are many popular hotels to choose from in New York. DoubleTree by Hilton New York Downtown, Four Points by Sheraton New York Downtown and Delta Hotels by Marriott New York Times Square are all popular hotels to stay at.

At what hotels in New York can I try local breakfast foods?

A delicious breakfast is a great way to kick start your day. At New York Hilton Midtown, Arlo NoMad and Motto by Hilton New York City Times Square , guests can enjoy New York-style breakfasts.

Which hotels in New York are suitable for families or travelers with kids?

Many people who travel with families or kids to New York choose to stay at Archer Hotel New York, The Pearl Hotel and Merrion Row Hotel and Public House . These hotels are also priced inexpensively.

What luxury hotels are recommended in New York?

New York Marriott Marquis, Conrad New York Downtown and InterContinental New York Times Square, an IHG Hotel are some of the most popular luxury hotels in New York.

What hotels in New York are suitable for couples?

Whether you're going on a honeymoon or a vacation with your partner, Carnegie Hotel, 3 West Club and THE FIFTH AVENUE HOTEL are some of the top hotels chosen by couples.

How much do hotels in New York cost on the weekend?

Based on hotel prices on Trip.com, the average cost per night on the weekend for hotels in New York is USD 839. Hotel rates change often; this price is for reference only.

When going on a business trip to New York, which hotels are the most popular with business travelers?

When it comes to business trips, choosing a hotel with convenient transportation links is important to many guests. Fairfield Inn & Suites by Marriott New York Manhattan/Central Park, Hyatt Grand Central New York and Courtyard New York Manhattan/Midtown East have convenient transportation links and inexpensive prices. Consider staying at one of these hotels during your trip.

At which popular hotels in New York can I try local foods?

Those who like trying local foods might want to consider staying at M Social Hotel Times Square New York, Millennium Hotel Broadway Times Square or Millennium Premier New York Times Square . There are lots of famous restaurants serving local dishes near these hotels.

Of all the hotels in New York, which hotels have the highest user ratings?

When traveling to New York for the first time, many travelers find it difficult to choose a hotel to stay in. According to Trip.com data, Artezen Hotel, THE FIFTH AVENUE HOTEL and Library Hotel by Library Hotel Collection are popular hotels with high ratings, making them good choices for your trip.

What popular hotels in New York have parking?

If you're planning on driving to New York, why not stay at DoubleTree by Hilton New York Downtown, Four Points by Sheraton New York Downtown or Millennium Premier New York Times Square ? These are all popular hotels with parking lots.

When traveling to New York, which hotels have pools?

Summer is a great season to take your kids or family on a trip to New York. West Side YMCA, Millennium Downtown New York and Holiday Inn New York City - Times Square, an IHG Hotel are popular hotels with pools.

What are some popular hotels near John F. Kennedy International Airport?

If you booked an early flight, you might want to stay at a hotel near John F. Kennedy International Airport the night before departure. Marriott New York JFK Airport, Best Western Jamaica Inn and Fairfield Inn by Marriott JFK Airport are popular choices for hotels to stay at.

What popular hotels have non-smoking rooms in New York?

Many guests care about the quality of the rooms they stay in and want to ensure that their rooms have fresh, clean air. Four Points by Sheraton New York Downtown, New York Hilton Midtown and M Social Hotel Times Square New York are all popular hotels in New York with non-smoking rooms.

In New York, which hotels have barrier-free access?

DoubleTree by Hilton New York Downtown, Millennium Hotel Broadway Times Square and New York Hilton Midtown are popular hotels in New York with barrier-free access.
